bullets.text: Powell: stocks 'fairly highly valued'; rate cut driven by slowing labor market; outlook remains challenging.
Nvidia–OpenAI $100B pact sparks global chip rally; Micron beats, sales up 46% on AI demand.
OpenAI's Stargate begins in Texas, with more sites planned; Oracle and SoftBank backing massive AI data center buildout.
OECD lifts U.S. and global growth forecasts as activity surprises to the upside.
Tether reportedly targets $500B valuation in capital raise, highlighting exuberance in crypto funding.
Morgan Stanley to offer crypto trading via E-Trade, signaling deepening mainstream adoption.
U.S. court revives Orsted's Revolution Wind; shares jump, underscoring regulatory risk and opportunity in renewables.
Eli Lilly investing $6.5B in Texas manufacturing for obesity pill and other drugs, boosting U.S. capacity.
Government shutdown risk rises as Trump cancels talks with Democrats; diplomatic tensions flare after combative U.N. remarks.
China moves to capture larger share of global gold trading, shifting price discovery influence toward Shanghai.
FDA approves leucovorin for autism, upending review norms and igniting debate over evidence standards.
Noninvasive brain signal biomarker predicts Alzheimer’s years before symptoms, enabling earlier intervention strategies.
Single-family rent growth weakens, signaling easing housing inflation pressures.
BYD says it has contingency plans if cut off from Nvidia chips, underscoring geopolitical tech supply risks.
